mapper.insert: INSERT INTO APPLY (APPLY_MENTORID, APPLY_MENTEEID, APPLY_MSG) VALUES (#{applyMentorId}, #{applyMenteeId}, #{applyMsg})
mapper.select: SELECT B.STUDY_TITLE, A.APPLY_NUM, A.APPLY_MENTORID, A.APPLY_MENTEEID, A.APPLY_AOR, A.APPLY_MSG FROM APPLY A INNER JOIN STUDY B ON A.APPLY_MENTORID = B.STUDY_USER_ID WHERE A.APPLY_MENTORID = #{userId} AND A.APPLY_NUM = 0 ORDER BY A.APPLY_MENTEEID
mapper.update: UPDATE APPLY SET APPLY_AOR = 1 WHERE APPLY_NUM = ${applyNum}
UPDATE APPLY SET APPLY_AOR = 2 WHERE APPLY_NUM = ${applyNum}
